location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter no.5036 of 1856 from Henry Anderson, Secretary to the Government of Bombay, to Commander Felix Jones, Resident in the Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: The letter is an acknowledgement of receipt of Jonesâ€™s earlier letter (folio 118) relating to the settlement for a claim between subjects of Koweit [Kuwait] and the Shaikh of Abu Dhabi over a boat. Anderson writes that the Government approves of proceedings.
